name: Forecasting & Modelling
description: Research focussed on forecasting the spread or modelling the dynamics of the virus

name: Disease Spread
description: Research examining examples of the spread of virus between communities or countries

name: Transmission
description: Research studying the means of transmission of the virus

name: Prevalence
description: Research studying the level of infections in different communities

name: Surveillance
description: Research developing methods for surveillance of the disease spread

name: Diagnostics
description: Research developing and testing methods to diagnose the virus

name: Prevention
description: Research examining tools for slowing the spread of the virus (e.g. PPE)

name: Preparedness
description: Research on strategies for a country, healthcare system or hospital to prepare for a pandemic

name: Risk Factors
description: Research examining risk factors for infection and severe symptoms

name: Symptoms
description: Research discussing the different symptoms of the virus

name: Case Reports
description: Case reports of single or multiple patients discussing their clinical course

name: Recommendations
description: Recommendations for medical professionals

name: Pediatrics
description: Research studying the effect of the virus on children

name: Medical Disciplines
description: Research focussing on the effect of the virus on a specific medical discipline

name: Healthcare Workers
description: Research studying the effect of the virus on healthcare workers

name: Molecular Biology
description: Research studying the molecular biology of the virus or host

name: Model Systems
description: Research proposing new model systems to study the virus

name: Immunology
description: Research studying the interactions of the virus and the immune system

name: Non-human
description: Research examining the effect of the virus in animals

name: Drug Repurposing
description: Research studying the use of existing drugs for combating the virus

name: Novel Therapeutics
description: Research developing new drugs to treat the virus

name: Vaccines
description: Research examining the development of vaccines

name: Drug Targets
description: TODO

name: Clinical Trials
description: Registered clinical trials for treating the virus

name: Non-therapeutics
description: Non-therapeutic interventions used to treat the virus

name: Psychology
description: Research studying the effect on patient and healthcare mental health and understanding of risk

name: Reviews
description: Review articles focussing on a variety of topics related to the virus

name: Comments & Editorials
description: Commentary, editorials and other short articles that are not original research

name: Updates
description: Articles that provide an update on the current state of the pandemic in different countries

name: Non-medical
description: Research examining the effect of the virus on other research areas (e.g. economics)
